# Signing RSA

The RSA implementation of the `@xyo-network/signing` protocol. The keys being created are generated using 2048 bits.

## Install

Using yarn

```sh
  yarn add @xyo-network/signing.rsa
```

Using npm

```sh
  npm install @xyo-network/signing.rsa --save
```
